body:
```
➜  ~ spack find gromacs
==> 1 installed package
-- linux-ubuntu20.04-zen2 / gcc@9.3.0 ---------------------------
gromacs@2021.1
➜  ~ spack gpg list
gpgconf: socketdir is '/run/user/1000/gnupg'
/home/bit/spack/opt/spack/gpg/pubring.kbx
-----------------------------------------
pub   rsa4096 2021-05-05 [SC]
      F9719DD5F169F4EA7CED228AFDC61D4337422368
uid           [ 未知 ] bit (GPG created for Spack) <mrfanyq@qq.com>

➜  ~ spack buildcache create -d mirror --rebuild-index gromacs
==> Buildcache files will be output to file:///home/bit/mirror/build_cache
==> Error:
 /tmp/tmpxgm6n7z2/libiconv-1.16-dukcmslv5qzcajajpbldun56gxtdgkxp/bin/iconv
contains string
 /home/bit/software
after replacing it in rpaths.
Package should not be relocated.
 Use -a to override.
```
title: I can't create a build_cache
